arStrings.szText:
{c_label}Essence Cost: {/c}{c_resource}{SF_3}{/c} per second
{if:Mod.MoveSpeed}Infuse your Minions with dark energy, causing them to deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} more damage and move {c_number}[{SF_4}*100|%|]{/c} faster.{else}Infuse your Minions with dark energy, causing them to deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} more damage.{/if}{if:Mod.RampEffect} This effect increases over time, to a maximum of {c_number}{SF_9}{/c} times the base bonus.{/if}
Dark Ritual increases the movement speed of your skeletons.
Dark Ritual's effect increases over time, up to a maximum of {c_number}3{/c} times greater.
Dark Ritual's maximum bonus is increased to {c_number}5{/c} times greater than the base increase.
